title: Opposition party demands vote of no confidence in PM, then doesn't bother to back it
summary_full: On Thursday, February 5th, a Saeima motion of no confidence in Prime Minister Evika Siliņa (New Unity) requested by the opposition faction Latvia First (LPV) failed – not least because it wasn't supported by the very people who had demanded it.
